local_intent: perform computed pick of white_plate and verify the grasp
assumptions: white_plate is detectable in the current frame
ComputeGraspPose produces a usable grasp stored as white_plate_grasp
Timing bins (timeout_ms) are sufficient for each action
coherence_with_global: Implements the 'grasp' phase of the global tree: perception (DetectObject), grasp planning (ComputeGraspPose), approach & align, execute pick with retry, and verify with IsGraspStable and ObjectInGripper.
